instruction: Generate a piece of free verse poetry about nature.
output:
The sky so vast and deep,
My heart so still and small.
The gentle breeze, like a whisper of awe,
The sun so bright, its warmth felt all.

All of nature’s beauty, 
A wonder of life so grand.
From the tallest tree to the smallest flower,
We stand in awe of the beauty of the land.

Nature's gifts and guidance, 
So much to learn, explore and see.
Look to the hills and valleys, 
The blessings of the Earth will always be.
